Remove the clamp (1) to remove the tank (2) from the lift pump manifold (3).
Technician Tips: The lift pump (6) is not a serviceable part. Replace the lift pump if repair is necessary.

Remove and inspect the following components. Make sure that the components are clean, not damaged, and correctly lubricated with hydraulic oil before replacement.
Sealing plug ball (7)
Relief valve (8)
Check valve (9)
Seals (10)
Plugs (11)
Solenoid coil (12)
Solenoid valve (13)
Inspect the lift pump (6) for damage and replace the lift pump if necessary.
Inspect the lift pump manifold (3) and the port threads for damage and replace the lift pump manifold if necessary.
